marketplace_goals.title: Marketplace Value Proposition
marketplace_goals.copilot_prompt:
Marketplace goals:
1) Provide a curated set of useful, opinionated crews (Backend Builder, Frontend Builder, Simple ETL, etc.).
2) Each crew template should have a clear description of inputs, outputs, and what problem it solves.
3) Installation should be one click and immediately runnable with minimal extra configuration.

Copilot: Keep marketplace features focused on discoverability and easy installation of high-quality crews, not on generic plugin systems.

marketplace_goals.title: Marketplace Safety & Ownership
marketplace_goals.copilot_prompt:
Marketplace safety rules:
1) Installing a template must create a new crew under the user's workspace; never mutate or delete existing crews.
2) Templates must not ship hardcoded credentials or unsafe tool configurations.
3) Template execution must still follow all sandbox and security policies.

Copilot: When modifying marketplace code, do not bypass sandbox, security, or multi-tenant safeguards.
